'''Notes'''
Graphic card work in very low resolution with default driver. Manual installation of SIS M671 is required and might be difficult for new Linux users. I have used instructions from <nowiki>[[http://hellbunker.blogspot.com/2010/11/sis-m671-on-linux.html|http://hellbunker.blogspot.com]]</nowiki> . As of 16 Jan 2011 there is no Linux 3D driver for this graphic card.
